mirrorImage

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage mirrorImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                                       edu.tamut.IP.ImageUtils.iKernel kernel)
Returns a BufferedImage with the edges mirrored

Parameters:
img - input image (BufferedImage)
kernel - This is a custom class that contains information about a nxm kernel for a sliding window for image filtration
Returns:
BufferedImage with the edges mirrored according to the nxm kernel
